price: 39.(Waxaan ku nidhi): Ku rid isaga sanduuq oo ku tuur webiga (Niil), kolkaasna webigu wuxuu ku tuuri xeebta, halkaas waxaa qaadan mid cadow ii ah, isagana cadow u ah!  Waxaan yeelay dushaada jaceyl lagu jeclaado Xaggeyga ah5, iyo in lagugu barbaariyo Ishayda horteed (waa Ilaalinteyda iyo Ogaanshaheyga),
arabic: أَنِ ٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ فَلۡيُلۡقِهِ ٱلۡيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأۡخُذۡهُ عَدُوّٞ لِّي وَعَدُوّٞ لَّهُۥۚ وَأَلۡقَيۡتُ عَلَيۡكَ مَحَبَّةٗ مِّنِّي وَلِتُصۡنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيۡنِيٓ
footnotes: 5. Alle wuxuu jeclaanta Muuse geliyey quluubta dadka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ani iq'dhifīhi fī al-tābūti fa-iq'dhifīhi fī al-yami falyul'qihi al-yamu bil-sāḥili yakhudh'hu ʿaduwwun lī waʿaduwwun lahu wa-alqaytu ʿalayka maḥabbatan minnī walituṣ'naʿa ʿalā ʿaynī
translations: and that you may be brought up
